attributes.action: Do more about dangerous driving isle of Skye
attributes.additional_details: In light of the recent incident that took place and cause a horrific crash. We need to do something about this and Make our voices heard and changes put in place.
attributes.background: Recently there have been far too many accidents over the past while here on isle of Skye, there isn't enough police patrolling or speed cameras or monitors, it's not just people visiting the isle it's locals as well driving dangerously, on mobile on so forth this needs to be stopped.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. 

You may wish to raise this issue with your local Police Inspector. You can find out how to contact them here: http://www.scotland.police.uk/your-community/highlands-and-islands/south-highlands/eilean-a-cheo/ 

You could also raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
